post.description: Use a valid refresh token to get a new access token.

Request a password reset email.

Always returns success to prevent email enumeration.

put.description: Update user profile, allowing phone and address changes but blocking other fields for active investments.

post.description: Create a new user account with email and password.

patch.description: Patch user profile, blocking account type changes for active investments.

put.description: Verify email with token and auto-login user.

get.description: Get the trusted contact for the current user.

put.description: Update the trusted contact for the current user.

post.description: Create a new trusted contact for the current user.

get.description:
Retrieve the investment agreement PDF document.

For investments in draft status, the PDF will be generated on the fly using the bond document
template. For investments that have been submitted or processed, the saved PDF will be loaded
from storage if it exists.
Return service health, reporting database connectivity state.

institution_id.title: Institution Id
institution_id.description: Plaid institution identifier (sandbox default: First Plaid Bank)

initial_products.title: Initial Products
initial_products.description: Plaid products to enable (auth required for ACH)

public_token.title: Public Token
public_token.description: Temporary token received from Plaid Link after user completes authentication

account_id.title: Account Id
account_id.description: Plaid account identifier for the selected bank account

account_mask.title: Account Mask
account_mask.description: Last 4 digits of the bank account

idempotency_key.title: Idempotency Key
idempotency_key.description: Unique identifier to prevent duplicate payment method creation (UUID v4 recommended)

idempotency_key.title: Idempotency Key
idempotency_key.description: Unique identifier to prevent duplicate payment method creation (UUID v4 recommended)

amount_1.title: Amount 1
amount_1.description: First micro-deposit amount in cents (only available in sandbox/test environments)

amount_2.title: Amount 2
amount_2.description: Second micro-deposit amount in cents (only available in sandbox/test environments)

current_balance.title: Current Balance
current_balance.description: Current account balance in dollars (null for manual entry accounts)

available_balance.title: Available Balance
available_balance.description: Available account balance in dollars (null for manual entry accounts)

balance_last_updated.title: Balance Last Updated
balance_last_updated.description: ISO 8601 timestamp of last balance update (null if never fetched)

verification_attempts_remaining.title: Verification Attempts Remaining
verification_attempts_remaining.description: Number of verification attempts remaining (null if not applicable)

verification_expires_at.title: Verification Expires At
verification_expires_at.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when verification expires (null if not applicable)

expires_in.title: Expires In
expires_in.description: Access token expiration time in seconds

expires_in.title: Expires In
expires_in.description: Access token expiration time in seconds

id.title: Id
id.description: User ID (can be numeric or human-readable like USR-1001)
